org.neuroph.util

Class NeuralNetworkFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neuroph.util.NeuralNetworkFactory

  • public class NeuralNetworkFactory
extends Object
    Provides methods to create various neural networks.
    Author:
    Zoran Sevarac
